ROM.Changelog:
==================== 03-30-2018 ====================
* build/make/ adbc8d28d Don't enable ANDROID_BINDER_IPC_32BIT for mixed userspace/kernel [Sagar Shah] * frameworks/av/ 3ecfd4315 Stagefright: Allow setting high-framerates in CameraSource [Kshitij Gupta] 0f90956b6 Stagefright: Do not skip frames in time-lapse-source for high-speed [Kshitij Gupta] c42b8fbc9 Camera: Add support for manual 3A. [Kshitij Gupta] 049e7f2c0 camera: allow device to append camera parameters [Kshitij Gupta] 84ee2f690 MediaProfiles: Enhance profiles for extended usecases [Kshitij Gupta] 068dae17b libmedia: Add 1440p camcorder quality [Kshitij Gupta] bb98becc1 av: compilation fix [Kshitij Gupta]
==================== 03-29-2018 ====================
* build/make/ ab08ed10d envsetup: Check conditions properly on ZSH [Kshitij Gupta] 88b5c4a85 envsetup: Fix lunch menu for ZSH [Kshitij Gupta] a21d9fb77 envesetup: mmm/mmma: fix for zsh [Kshitij Gupta] * vendor/ota/ 4ea9458 OTA: Update kenzo (29/03/2018) (#121) [Sagar Shah] 29a8d39 OTA: Update mido (28/03/2018) [Sebastian] c2f213c OTA: Update tissot (28/03/2018) [Sagar Shah]

* frameworks/base/ 05b317bba9f Keyguard: Don't listen for fingerprint when prox.sensor is covered [Sagar Shah] 5b0999c0f37 Color fix for Notification Expandable Indicator with SystemTheme [zeromod] fad21cd0eca Add Center Clock (With Ticker Fixed) [1/2] [zeromod] d658488a3f8 Add Android P transition [zeromod] * hardware/libhardware_legacy/ caf16d8 Wifi: Add Qpower interface to libhardware_legacy [Sagar Shah] 8875083 [AWARE]: Add support to config NAN discovery beacon interval [Sagar Shah] 53ff459 [AWARE]: Add support for NAN qos config, schedule update channel [Sagar Shah] * manifest/ eda7a14 manifest: Track power,wlan and bt hals from lineage [Sagar Shah] * packages/apps/Galaxy/ 344a526 Add Center Clock [2/2] [zeromod] * system/bt/ 43bb445a btm_inq: fix build with BTA_HOST_INTERLEAVE_SEARCH [Sagar Shah] 401169f5 Prevent abort in case of command timeout [Sagar Shah] 8c8e5523 Bluetooth: Read BLE vendor capability to proceed on Secure conn [Sagar Shah]
